Activity: Wake up, have a coffee and mentally prepare for the day.
Check emails, respond to any urgent requests. Review yesterday's notes and action items.

Meeting with @DEVOPS-1 to discuss infrastructure security requirements. Define the scope of security measures needed, including network segmentation, access controls, and monitoring tools. Document the agreed-upon security protocols.
Review the data analysis module specifications provided by @DSDE-1 and @DSDE-2. Identify potential data security concerns and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

Email @DSDE-1, @DSDE-2: Subject: Data Analysis Module Security Considerations - Input Needed. Request clarification on data storage, processing, and transmission methods used by the data analysis module to assess potential security risks.
Lunch Break - Read a chapter of a book on system design.
Work on implementing the initial framework for the risk management module integration. Focus on creating a secure communication channel between the trade execution and risk management modules.
Code review and testing of the secure communication channel. Implement unit tests to verify data integrity and authentication mechanisms.
Address code review feedback and fix any identified bugs. Refactor code for improved readability and maintainability.
Update the infrastructure architecture diagram to reflect the implemented security measures and integration points. Ensure the diagram accurately represents the current state of the system.
End of day. Backup all progress and outline tasks for tomorrow.
